entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:39 a.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 22. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
